content.description: The best problem on both Gully Boulders, which starts sitting low and around the corner from Squeeze Job on a left hand  undercling/sidepull and right on a good pinch at the same level. Pull off of the ground, throw a left heelhook, and cliimb the nice right trending arete topping out at the high point.
content.location: Left and around the corner from Squeeze Job.

content.description: Start sitting with left high up on the arete and right lower on a good flat hold. Pull up off the ground and snag the good jug up and right. Top out.
content.location: About 3-4 feet left of The Compromise.

content.description: Start standing just right of Carnival Worker on the smooth, orange, wave-like slab. With minimal feet and hands, rock onto the slab and shoot up and right for a jug.

content.location: On the right arete on the Second Gully Boulder.

content.description: Start the same as for The Groove, make the hard crank off the ground, move up, and follow the left arete up to some better holds.
Stand start on a pad or two with a high, decent, left crescent crimp and a sloping ball on the arete. Climb up and then move left to top out at the highest point on the boulder. The sit is a project.
content.location: On the second Gully Boulder about 4-5 feet left of the problem Progeny.

content.description: Sit start as for the problem Horny on a rock with a good left sidepull and an OK right crimp with your right foot way up high on a good edge.Make a few moves up and then traverse low across the groove and join the slopey tall arete and face.The stand start is V5.
content.location: On the Second Gully Boulder about 7-8 feet left of the problem Hooligans.

content.description: Sit start about 6-8 feet around the corner from the problem The Groove on the Second Gully Boulder. Climb the undercut, rounded face.
Sit start the left arete and face and move up to a big dyno to the lip. Harder if you are under six feet.
content.location: On the First Gully Boulder...about 6 feet left of the problem Going Postal.

content.description: Stand start on the right arete about 2-3 feet left of the rotted tree stump. Crank to the lip and traverse left, mantle and top out.

Sit start in the middle of the undercut bulge about 6-8 feet left of the problem Booty Check with poor feet and hands. Move up the face on hard slopers and make a few hard moves until you get the better holds up higher.
content.location: On the First Gully Boulder which is readily identifiable by the rotted tree stump.

content.description: Sit start with a good, low left hand black crimp and a lousy right hand sloper and strange feet. Crank to a couple of very small crimps and top out.
content.location: On the far left side of the second Gully Boulder about 10-12 feet left of the problem Friday's Hero.

content.description: Sit start matched on a good hold. Crank to a distant, positive hold and top out.
content.location: On the backside of the First Gully Boulder about 8 feet right of the problem The Compromise.

content.description: Crouch start on the overhanging bulge that faces away from the trail. Move up and top out.
content.location: About 150-200 feet below the first Gully Boulder.

content.description: These are two granite eggs about 150 feet apart from each other.
